summary: Querying a complete workflow twice fails on the second query with an internal error about a nonexistent run ID. The first query succeeds but subsequent queries to the same completed workflow throw errors.
userImpact: Users cannot reliably query completed workflows multiple times, limiting the ability to retrieve workflow results after completion.
rootCause: The SDK core was not properly handling queries on completed workflows, causing cache invalidation issues with run IDs.
resolutionDetails: Fixed in sdk-core via PR #199; issue was resolved in the main branch and addressed in the next Node SDK release.
keyQuote: The second query should be successful otherwise better error message is expected.
